actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the luxury excise tax shall not apply to certain equipment installed on a passenger vehicle for the use of disabled individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the luxury excise tax parts for accessories installed for use of passenger vehicles by disabled individuals.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the luxury excise tax shall not apply to certain equipment installed on a passenger vehicle for the use of disabled individuals.
